net.powermatcher.api.data

Class Bid

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.powermatcher.api.data.Bid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayBid, PointBid

    public abstract class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
    This immutable abstract data object defines the basis for a Bid in the Powermatcher cluster. The bid curve can be represented in several ways, so subclasses will have their own implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MarketBasis marketBasis
      The MarketBasis of the cluster.
      protected static double SMALLEST_DEMAND
      The smallest difference between demands, for them to be called different.

    • Method Detail

      • demandIsEqual

        protected static boolean demandIsEqual(double demand1,
                    double demand2)
        Tests if the difference between the 2 demand values is less that SMALLEST_DEMAND.
        Parameters:
        demand1 - The first demand
        demand2 - The second demand
        Returns:
        true when the difference between the 2 demand values is less than SMALLEST_DEMAND

      • flatDemand

        public static Bid flatDemand(MarketBasis marketBasis,
             double demand)
        Creates a new flat Bid with a given demand.
        Parameters:
        marketBasis - The MarketBasis on which the Bid should be based
        demand - The constant demand value
        Returns:
        A new Bid that represents a flat bid

      • getMarketBasis

        public MarketBasis getMarketBasis()
        Returns:
        the current value of marketBasis.

      • aggregate

        public abstract Bid aggregate(Bid other)
        Aggregates this Bid instance with another Bid. Bid are aggregated by adding their bid curves.
        Parameters:
        other - The Bid whose bid curve has to be added to the bid curve of this instance.
        Returns:
        A new aggregated Bid.

      • calculateIntersection

        public abstract Price calculateIntersection(double targetDemand)
        Calculates the Price at the intersection with the bid curve at the given demand.
        Parameters:
        targetDemand - the part of the bid curve you want to get the Price of.
        Returns:
        the calculatedPrice

      • getMaximumDemand

        public abstract double getMaximumDemand()
        Returns:
        the highest demand in the demand curve.

      • getMinimumDemand

        public abstract double getMinimumDemand()
        Returns:
        the lowest demand in the demand curve.

      • toArrayBid

        public abstract ArrayBid toArrayBid()
        Returns:

      • toPointBid

        public abstract PointBid toPointBid()
        Returns:

      • getDemandAt

        public double getDemandAt(PriceStep priceStep)
        Calculates the demand at the intersection with the bid curve at the given PriceStep. Implementation note: you should always override either this method or the getDemandAt(Price) method. The default implementation is to call the other.
        Parameters:
        priceStep - the PriceStep you want to know the demand of.
        Returns:
        the calculated demand

      • getDemandAt

        public double getDemandAt(Price price)
        Calculates the demand at the intersection in the bid curve with the priceStep in a demand array. Implementation note: you should always override either this method or the getDemandAt(PriceStep) method. The default implementation is to call the other.
        Parameters:
        price - the Price you want to know the demand of.
        Returns:
        the calculated demand
